Reviews.Title: Do not buy from Nat's Electronics
Reviews.Author: Stweven
Reviews.Content: I purchased an unlocked Iphone 2G from Nat's Electronics and when I got the phone it was and still is lock. It was a waste of $200 dollars, I sent the company an email and never got a response back. Do not buy from this company and if you do your going toget ripped off.

Reviews.Title: Buy far best budget phone on the market right now.
Reviews.Author: Roman
Reviews.Content: I'm not entirely sure why there are so many negative reviews on this page. I thought these reviews are meant to be reviews of the product, not the quality of service you got from different sellers? Who knows maybe I'm confused.This is by far the most functional "budget phone" you will ever buy. For little more than a hundred dollars you can have email through a wifi connection. The interface is impeccable compared to any other phone in this price range. Calendar and contact applications are all very intuitive.  Not to mention you have iPod on the phone too.For an even better deal you can get an unlocked iPhone and use it with any prepaid service like Net10 or GoPhone, save a boat load of money compared to traditional AT&T; plans.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 2G 8GB
Reviews.Author: levaniko
Reviews.Content: I was kinda nervous when I ordered it, because it was first ever used thing that I've ordered from amazon, and seller had no rating at all, but phone that I got was in very good condition for money that I paid for it. no scratches on screen and no major scratches on back side. only power button was not working but it was very easy to fix. I'm fully satisfied with purchase.

Reviews.Title: used Iphone 2g purhcase
Reviews.Author: Victor Echeveste
Reviews.Content: works great and just need to get a sim for it, no games on it though but I can live with that.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPHONE
Reviews.Author: Tina Saylor
Reviews.Content: Great phone! Works perfectly, easy to use, and got it a great price. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Iphone Honest Review
Reviews.Author: Ben Capitelli
Reviews.Content: Ok so the iPhone is incredible. It seems to be years ahead of its competition. Like imagine in 1998 a motorola razr being availible, where what would phones look like now? Will this iphone is the same analogy, imagine the iphone in 2007 where would we be now. This phone will set a precedent to many companies, that they have to raise their bar. Ok so the review:Design: 5/5- cant complain about the glass and aluminum which makes the devie surprisingly thin and very light.Functions: 4/5 I would like there to be a flash player meaning i can watch trailers and other things like that use video on a website.Battery: 2/5- battery is horrific. Dont expect to be able to listen to your music, browse the web and talk at the same time. If you listen to your ipod and browse the web at the same time, the battery is draining exponentially. And when it reaches the 20% mark it seems like theres only 5 minutes of battery life left no matter what you are doing with the iphone. The battery issue is a huge problem and hopefully when i send it back to apple they will have invented a much better battery for its users. I would say that if you use your iphone's ipod 2 hours a day, and browse the web 2 hours (including email), and talk for about 2 hours you pretty much used up all the battery has to offer. This means charging the phone nightly. The more you charge, the weaker the battery gets. Now if you talk lets say for 1 hour listen to music for 1 hour and browse the web for 1 hour, you'll still need to charge daily because overnight the battery will still drain because the phone never really shuts off when its on stand by. If you do shut it off at night though, you probably wont have enough battery to go through the next day anyways. It seems like the first 50% used is twice as long as the last 50% used.All in all the phone saves plenty of room in my pants and is a great phone and practical. Careful walking around with it on your belt. Its probably the #1 desired item for pick pockets right now. However dont forget that the battery is atrocious and offensive that they couldn't give us a battery as strong as other pda's. But enjoy it while it has power.

Reviews.Title: It Could've Been Better!
Reviews.Author: Willy Francis
Reviews.Content: I got this phone hoping there would be no dings but unfortunately there was but the phone works perfectely fine!

Reviews.Title: apple iphone
Reviews.Author: Ellie
Reviews.Content: The description said nothing about it being cracked and it wont turn on! I charged it and it still doesn't work!

Reviews.Title: Very cool old iPhone
Reviews.Author: Bigfoot
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the very cool old iPhone these of the first gen are hard to come by Iam glad it was a first gen they are the coollest thanks for the promt delivery you most  certainly deserve a 5 star rating thank you

Reviews.Title: iPhone 2G
Reviews.Author: Mac User
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described... can't say much more about it... Was running iOS 3.1.3 so it was kind of old.. But if you are looking for a cheap iPhone go ahead and get it!

Reviews.Title: did not work
Reviews.Author: johnm
Reviews.Content: so i got this phone in today, and my sim card did not work, but you said it was unlocked. so why didnt it work with my tmobile sim card ?

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, great browser, lousy iPod
Reviews.Author: Rev "critic"
Reviews.Content: Don't expect to replace your iPod with an iPhone if you do anything other than listen to your iPod through headphones.Between the odd, recessed headphone plug that only accommodates apple ear buds, the fact that you can't manually manage music, and the inability to play tracks that are on your iPhone through a computer that it is connected to, the iPod features of the iPhone are seriously crippling.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 2G 8GB
Reviews.Author: shakespeare
Reviews.Content: this was the worst thing i ever bough i cant even use it i need an at&t; sim and i dont have one

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER
Reviews.Author: David J. Squibbs
Reviews.Content: bought two phones, one works so-so.  the other one total waste of time and money, bad battery, totally ripped off.  Don't buy a used phone from this seller, unless you want a useless phone for parts.

Reviews.Title: Horrible.
Reviews.Author: HDTV
Reviews.Content: It was all scratched up and the scream was cracked when I got it. It will not download any applications. It is worthless.

Reviews.Title: I do not like it at all.
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I do not like the phone  because the person gadgets4me ripped me off. In his or her pictures about the phone it showed that it is going to come with earbuds and a charger(wall charger) and it never did. It did not even come with a sim card, not even with the box.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Tareall Powell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item it was delivered a head of time it was delivered just as it was described. I was confused on its operations and setup. I emailed him and he walked me through the process. I am waiting to see what else I can purchase from this company. WONDERFUL!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Its an out of date phone I wouldn't buy it unless you only wanted it for texting and calls. Can't send pics or really get online with it. But if you only plan on using it for that then its a pretty good phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Rashida C.
Reviews.Content: This phone had no scratches what so ever on it, it was like brand new basically for a good low price. Thanks soo much !

Reviews.Content: its great iphone.. works and comes with home charger and car charges , black phone case with clear plastic in front .... shipping is standard ....

Reviews.Title: unlocked and jailbrocked?
Reviews.Author: Giorgi
Reviews.Content: this is normal price for this item, but it's important to know for me:are these iphones already unlocked and jailbrocked or not? Will they work with any GSM operator?

Reviews.Title: Iphone2g purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazfanatic
Reviews.Content: The phone is not good as new!Im not satisfied with the phone appearance. It had way to many scarches and damages on he back and sides. The only good thing was the screen, although it had a small scratch.

Reviews.Title: George
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: This was disgrace to buy used stuff.Advise never buy used eletronic stuff online.Most of them are in worst shape & condition then you think.

Reviews.Title: BAD PRODUCT!!
Reviews.Author: msturner
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone and it DID NOT work!! I was very disappointed.. I sent the ph one back and got a refund!

Reviews.Title: I waited in line for this?
Reviews.Author: Dog Lover "Dog lover"
Reviews.Content: I am shocked! Didn't anyone test this thing before they put it into production?So when I use the phone and bump the touch screen on my face it activates the end call command on the bottom and hangs up.The internet is slower than molasses, the Icons need to be pressed with a finger much smaller than mine or else you press 2 at once and if you have any oils on you face or maybe makeup too, you will have to clean the screen after very use or you will just see a blurry screen. I am glad I got to try it first.

Reviews.Title: I DO NOT RECOMEND THIS VERSION
Reviews.Author: S. Bolanowski
Reviews.Content: The ipone is a new, cool, and amazing product. im not saying its bad, but apple has already has the fifth generation iphone in plans. i dont see why you should get this product unless u are willing to loose money. FYI im a proud apple user and all apple products are genius.

Reviews.Title: HUH???
Reviews.Author: Hippyengineer
Reviews.Content: Why is there even a listing for the iphone in Amazon if it is not offered?
